page.title: 17HOME LIFE
page.content: My working day starts at around 8.30am,the first step is to sort out the willow in different sizes according to the type of basket I am going to make.I then put them into a big water tank to soak for about 45mins.I then have a cup of tea and some toast. I return to my workshop,take the willow out of the tank which by now is supple so I can work it to make the basket.While I work I listen to the radio, the station I prefer is radio 4.My lunchtime is 1 o'clock. I take about half an hour and then carry on until around 4pm which is cup of tea and biscuit time. I have by this time made a variety of baskets and my finishing time is around 5.30pm.I then sort out some more willow for the following day.
